title: Wis. Family Calls For Peaceful Protests After Police Kill Unarmed Black Man
teaser: In Madison, Wisconsin, police and public officials are trying hard to contrast the police shooting of an unarmed black man in their city last week with the shooting of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Missouri, last year. Protesters plan more marches.  An independent investigation is looking into the shooting of 19-year-old Tony Robinson.
